name: perl-xml-index
unsub: Subscribe by sending an email to mailto: majordomo@majordomo.jyu.fi
summary: This mailing list was set up to discuss issues relating to using Perl to generate an index over a collection of N heterogeneous XML documents, such that when the index is accessed with a keyword (indexed word), it returns a list of "occurrence locations" for this keyword.
sub: Subscribe by sending an email to mailto: majordomo@majordomo.jyu.fi
